title: The High Priestly Prayer
itunes:title: The High Priestly Prayer
description: As the Easter season draws to a close, we hear from one of the most magnificent passages in the Gospel of John窶馬amely, the high-priestly prayer of Jesus the night of the Last Supper. It is by far the longest discourse by Jesus anywhere in the New Testament, and it contains the seeds of Christian spirituality in its entirety.
